00006         function load_outbounds(frm)
00007         {
00008                 return Servo.post({
00009                         form:frm,
00010                         url:'<?php echo $this->url_to(array('action' => 'outbounds_list')); ?>',
00011                         target:document.getElementById('outbounds_container'),
00012                         oncomplete: add_info_handlers
00013                 });
00014         }
00015         
00016         function add_info_handlers()
00017         {
00018                 $('span.info-button').click(function(e)
00019                         {
00020                                 var me = this;
00021                                 Servo.load({
00022                                         url: '<?php echo $this->url_to(array('action' => 'id')); ?>?id=' + this.id.substring(this.id.indexOf("-") + 1),
00023                                         target: me,
00024                                         oncomplete: function() {
00025                                                 me.className = '';
00026                                         }
00027                                 });
00028                         });
00029         }
00030
